title: 2 Bugs I've come across.
body:
1.
Farsight Orb's tooltip cooldown after use doesn't work. So when I have to use it i don't even know if it's up or not.
The cooldown doesn't even appear it just stays the same even after I've used it.

2.
Not sure if just me but colourblind mode is bugged for me. I've had it on for a while cuz i like the blue, but now I wanna switch back to the green and purple but whenever I try it doesn't work. The only thing that changes is the green healthbar, the chat stays blue which is rly annyoing 
pls help

replies.body:
>I wanna switch back to the green and purple

Man, you might actually be colour-blind.

Anyway, the first part of this post should go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report). As for the second part, have you tried repairing your client? Be sure to back-up your item sets and configs first!

lol green = the green healthbar above ur head, not the team sorry my bad xD
anyways thx

Ah ok, I was thinking the team colous, which are red and blue by default. Their colour-blind mode is red and green. Wasn't thinking about the individual health bars.

Have you tried repairing your client? Did it fix it for you?
